title: [Rant] 8-4 classes? It’s a torture
content: Idk what is wrong with these people? 8 am in the morning is torture I’ve to manage my job classes and house chores am I supposed to skip my breakfast dinner and lunch?

comments.body: I had 8- 4.45 in first sem before isa 1 🙏🏿
bruh u get breaks for bf and lunch, and this is like just one day of the week bruh
Jus bunk the last 3 classes slime🙏💔🥀
wake up at 5am sleep at 9pm, everything will fall on schedule
You will have atleast two half days a week chill
Ahh I suffer from insomnia I get 4 hours of good sleep that is from 3-7 am in the morning
Then why are you ranting about it being torture without attending a single day lmao

2 days although you're point makes sense. 2 days of utter torture. And talking about breaks, most of our proffs leave us 10 min late although there are a few who leave us 5 min early.This was expected from PES but it only sucks once you experience it firsthand.
